tasks.task: Attend International Year of Pulses event
subtasks: Consider incorporating pulses into daily diet
Recognize mutation breeding as a nuclear technique since 1930s
Know how mutant pulses are more adaptable, resistant, high-yield

tasks.task: Appreciate pulses' role in soil fertility
subtasks: Understand pulses' ability to fix atmospheric nitrogen
Acknowledge nitrogen fixation as natural fertilization

tasks.task: Recognize pulses' long cultivation history and recent recognition
subtasks: Note pulses have been cultivated for over 10,000 years
Understand pulses are now valued for nutrition and sustainable development
